properties.areaDesc: Greenup, KY; Lawrence, OH; Boyd, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 5:30AM EST until February 16 at 3:10PM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio...
West Virginia...

Ohio River At Point Pleasant affecting Gallia and Mason Counties.

...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio...
Kentucky...West Virginia...

Ohio River At Ashland affecting Greenup, Boyd and Lawrence
Counties.

For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River At Ashland.
* From this afternoon to Sunday afternoon.
* At 5:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 51.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 52.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this
afternoon to a crest of 54.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then
fall below flood stage late Sunday morning.
* Impact...At 55.5 feet, Route 3 is flooded at Catlettsburg.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 54.6
feet on 01/21/1996.
properties.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive
cars through flooded areas.

Please report Severe Weather to the National Weather Service by
calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely. You may
also report severe weather by posting your report to the Charleston
West Virginia National Weather Service Facebook Page, or by using
the Twitter Hashtag, NWSRLX.

Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.

Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx.

The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 530 PM EST.

NWSheadline: The Flood Warning is now in effect until Sunday afternoon
